00002  * Wrappers around strtoull/strtoll that are safer and easier to
00003  * use.  For tests and assumptions, see internal_tests.c.
00004  *
00005  * str   a NULL-terminated base decimal 10 unsigned integer
00006  * out   out parameter, if conversion succeeded
00007  *
00008  * returns true if conversion succeeded.
00009  */
